name: Zom-ball Warrior (mix and game jam 2020)
description:
My first attempt at a game Jam. (2 Genres mixed)

Playable basic pinball machine style game with zombies.

I've had unity for years but only just sat down to learn it properly .. or at least the basics.  9 days in and I'm not unimpressed by what I've achieved.

The Idea was to keep the zombies at bay by playing pinball , knock them out with balls or hit special targets to unlock effects.

Unforts there were some hickups (hinge joints :P) so I didn't quite get as far as I wanted in the time.
